mapper.select: select max(MAINID) as max_Id from cqwu_teachPlace
mapper.insert:
insert into cqwu_teachPlace( MAINID, ISVALID, ISDELETED, teachPlaceName, teachPlaceCODE, teachPlaceTYPE, CAMPUSCODE, buildingCode, capacity, floor, houseNumber
) values ( #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ISVALID}, #{ISDELETED}, #{MC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LX_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school_area}, #{SZWZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RL,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{Layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{MPH,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
